title: [Mega Tracking] Align Codebase to Spec v0.4
body:
This issue tracks the overall progress of updating the current beacon chain implementation to spec [v0.4](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/releases/tag/v0.4.0) Here is what has been done so far and the missing steps:

### **Phase 0 Beacon Chain Spec**

🍪 **Features:**

| Descriptions  | Eth2.0 spec PR   | Prysm PR   |
|------------ | ------------- |-------------|
| refactor signature hashing to use new unified ssz method  |  [633](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/633)  |   |
| max list size in get_permuted_index | [634](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/634)  |   |
| reduce genesis slot to 2**32|  [655](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/655)|  |
| simpler is_power_of_two implementation |  [674](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/674) |  #1684 |
| specify lexicographic ordering of crosslink_data_root |  [676](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/676)|   |
| allow transfers from both non-activated and exited validators |  [678](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/678) |   |

| Descriptions  | Eth2.0 spec PR   | Prysm PR   |

| fix slot range for attestation inclusion  | [669](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/669)  |  #1715 |
| fix previous epoch logic |  [672](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/672)  | #1721 |
| fix handling of bad proof of possession in deposit |  [689](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/689)  | N/A |
| minor bugs related to ordering/typos/var-mismatch/etc |  [648](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/648) [650](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/650) [654](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/654) [656](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/656) [664](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/664) [661](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/661)  |  #1723 |
